name: Water Defense (itch)
description:
NOTE: This is a submission for the Weekly Game Jam #143, the theme being "Running Water". This is my third game jam and the second Weekly one I've done.

Huge thanks to "Water 2D" on the Unity asset store, I used it for the water gun for the player. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/water-2d-136297

Water Defense

Move around your player and aim with your mouse to shoot a constant stream of water at your enemies! The waves are infinite, so go as long as you can. Upgrade certain attributes with money you get for defeating enemies. Careful, the upgrades are limited and increase in cost when bought! 

Enemies are also randomized and increase in amount per wave, so there might be some unfair scenarios.

I might add future upgrades and updates, depends on whether I feel like it or not.

Developed and created by Gregory Weber.
